resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103477</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103477</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206021</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">R. Buckminster Fuller: Thinking Out Loud</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">R. Buckminster Fuller: Heraus Loud Denken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">R. Buckminster Fuller : Pensée Dehors Fort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">R. Buckminster Cheio: Pensar Para fora 
Ruidosamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">R. Buckminster Fuller: Pensare Fuori Alto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρ. Buckminster πληρέστερο: Να σκεφτεί έξω 
δυνατός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">R. Buckminster Fuller: Pensamiento Hacia 
fuera Ruidosamente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a spinoff from the PBS series about the architect, designer, engineer, poet, philosopher, author, and global iconoclast, best known for the geodesic dome.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Nebenwirkung von der PBS Serie über 
den Architekten, den Entwerfer, den Ingenieur, den Dichter, den 
Philosophen, den Autor und den globalen Ikonoklast, gut bekannt für 
die geodesic Haube.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une application secondaire de la série de PBS
au sujet de l'architecte, du créateur, de l'ingénieur, du poèt, du 
philosophe, de l'auteur, et de l'iconoclaste global, mieux connu pour 
le dôme géodésique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um spinoff da série de PBS sobre o arquiteto, 
o desenhador, o coordenador, o poeta, o filósofo, o autor, e o 
iconoclast global, conhecido melhor para a abóbada geodesic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un prodotto derivato dalla serie di PBS circa 
l'architetto, il progettista, l'assistente tecnico, il poet, il 
filosofo, l'autore ed il iconoclast globale, conosciuto il più bene 
per la cupola geodesic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα υποπροϊόν από τη σειρά PBS για τον 
αρχιτέκτονα, το σχεδιαστή, το μηχανικό, τον ποιητή, το φιλόσοφο, 
το συντάκτη, και το σφαιρικό εικονοκλάστη, που είναι γνωστό 
καλύτερα για το γεωδεσικό θόλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un efecto de la serie de PBS sobre el 
arquitecto, el diseñador, el ingeniero, el poeta, el filósofo, el 
autor, y el iconoclast global, conocido lo más mejor posible para la 
bóveda geodésica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206021</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103477</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/r-buckminster-fuller-thinking-out-loud</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
